stories.text:
Ever had questions about how to measure metrics for how a new feature performs or to compare what part of your website that users interact with the most out of possible options (app feature performance hypothesis)? I created a little tool that allows you to create experiments and insert a code snippet into your code and it automatically measures relevant data that is easily visualized for you. You can check it out here: https://www.researchapp.co/

Looking for partners on marketing this product. Also, I will appreciate some feedback. Thank you.
stories.title: Website Experiments as a Service
